note: Minimal SM inputs at μ = MZ for initializing 1-loop RG running. Values are typical MSbar/PDG-era central values; adjust to your preferred scheme/likelihood.
scheme: MSbar-ish (inputs interpreted at μ=MZ unless stated otherwise)

sources.alpha_em_inv: PDG (α_em(MZ) in MSbar is ~1/127.95; check your preferred value)
sources.sin2_thetaW: PDG (sin^2 θ_W(MZ) in MSbar is ~0.23122; check your preferred value)
sources.sin2_thetaW_sigma: Typical MSbar sin^2 θ_W uncertainty scale (order 1e-4); replace by your preferred likelihood for publication
sources.alpha_s_sigma: PDG-era uncertainty (order 1e-3); adjust to your preferred likelihood
sources.alpha_em_inv_sigma: Typical α_em^{-1}(MZ) MSbar uncertainty scale (order 1e-2); replace by your preferred likelihood for publication
sources.mW_GeV: PDG (W pole mass, for threshold bookkeeping if desired)
sources.mH_GeV: PDG (Higgs pole mass, for threshold bookkeeping if desired)
sources.mc_GeV: PDG-ish (charm threshold scale for αs matching; scheme-dependent)
sources.mb_GeV: PDG-ish (bottom threshold scale for αs matching; scheme-dependent)
sources.mt_GeV: PDG-ish (top threshold scale; pole vs MSbar is scheme-dependent)
sources.mt_sigma_GeV: Typical top pole mass uncertainty scale (order 0.3 GeV); replace by your preferred likelihood for publication
sources.matching_mc_samples: Monte Carlo sample size for msbar_matching_map uncertainty propagation (deterministic via SuiteConfig.seed)
